(This has gotta go back a little ways because I wasn't around to defend myself. And there was like no time to reply.)
Cryotek:
     Cryotek was sitting in the main office when he head Galvatron's voice. He immediatly got up and ran for it, as he got out of the base he transformed to his dragon mode, but the ship exploded before he could get clear of the blast wave and was sent through the forest, destroying oh so many trees.
     He slowly got up, looked himself over, he was pretty damaged, "Well, there goes that idea."
     He opened a comm to Cygnar, "Cygnar, your base is gone, and I'm pretty damaged."
 aerosmith60@... wrote:Hydras stood up. "The maximal base it is then....but for now." He opened up a channel to the old Galvatron base. "Voice code Galvatron self destruct." his voice was his old Galvatron voice exactly as he said the command Galvatron's base explodes into pieces.
